Release Notes

1.4.0 - TODO

  1. TODO: Document changes here...

1.3.2 - 2024-06-21

  1. Notification configuration and Email translation fixed

1.3.1 - 2024-06-21

  1. Script include AppInstallDeactivateNotifcations created (decativation OOTB Notifications)

1.2.0 - 2024-06-19

  1. [SMNOW-1637] Feature: Email Notifaction
  2. [SMNOW-975] Feature: Email Notification footer

1.1.0 - 25.04.2024

  1. SMNOW-1463 Enabler: Application "Notification SM.now V1.1.0" intit version
  2. SMNOW-1463 Enabler: Application "Notification SM.now V1.1.0" ATF-test finalized
  3. SMNOW-1463 Enabler: Application "Notification SM.now V1.1.0" Initial Group handling implemented (script IncidentTicketAssignmentGroup)

1.0.14 - 2024-04-24

  1. Separated Client Runner from Standard Test Suite SMNOW-1002
  2. Notification for Unknown Caller SMNOW-1187
  3. Notification for Service Operation Workspace Users SMNOW-1335

1.0.13 - 2024-04-24

  1. Created Translation for notification INCIDENT_COMMENTED.toCaller
  2. Created Translation Packages for Notification
  3. Notification for Unknown Caller SMNOW-1187
  4. Notification for Service Operation Workspace Users SMNOW-1335
  5. Automatically package Notification xmls for deployment SMNOW-1363

1.0.12 - 2023-02-02

  1. SMNOW-947 : Updated TicketLinkService script include to make the incident link dynamic for Internal and External Receipients
  2. Created ATFstest cases for INM V1.1 - SSO Deep link support and updated the wiki page.
  3. Separated Client Runner tests from Standard Test Suite - SMNOW-1002

1.0.11 - 2023-11-17

  1. New ATFs
  2. Change Access for Script Include 'x_dtitg_notificati.InternalTicketCondition' to all Application Scopes to fix ATF issue

1.0.10 - 2023-10-31

  1. Updated App Dependencies
  2. ATF Test Created

1.0.9 - 2023-10-26

  1. Version Baselined

1.0.8 - 2023-10-26

  1. ATF Fixes and Dependencies

1.0.7 - 2023-10-2023

  1. Additional ATF-Fix

1.0.6 - 2023-10-23

  1. Fix Unit-Tests that failed on TEST-ENV
  2. Assign Integration-Test to correct (parent) Test-Suite

1.0.5 - 2023-10-19

  1. Delted unused UI Action
  2. Fix Dependencies
  3. Add Additional Tests

1.0.4 - 2023-10-12

  1. BugFix: Internal Ticket Condition
  2. BugFix: Glide Element Decoder

1.0.3 - 2023-10-11

  1. BugFix: AppInstall script

1.0.2 - 2023-10-10

  1. BugFix: AppInstall script

1.0.1 - 2023-10-02

  1. BugFix: Regarding LanguageID

1.0.0 - 2023-09-27

Initial Version of Notification SM.now

For detailed information please refer to: https://wiki.telekom.de/x/zPAvWw , https://wiki.telekom.de/x/zNroWw and https://wiki.telekom.de/x/BKbAXg
